channel.title: [508] Has to be simple
channel.description: Okay well I am well known for missing the little things that cause everything to go wrong so I am sure this is just plain stupidity on my end so I'll say that now before I get 30 post calling my stupid lol. Thing is I have not done servers in a very long time so now I am trying to get back into the swing of things. I decided to go with a 508, I love how things are organized instead of it all being in the Client java. Any who here is my problem. I compile server, in this case I am using RS4Ever, I run server, then Run client. But Here is the problem Client gets stuck at "Connecting to update server" and I get "error_game_js5connect" in the Command window. Anyone have a clue what I have done wrong?

item.title: [508] Has to be simple
item.dc:creator: @redneck97 redneck97
item.description:
@redneck97 wrote:

Okay well I have narrowed it down and should be able to fix the problem. It was the Client not able to connect, Im working on it now. Thank you for your help.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Has to be simple
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Look in Loader.java as well as Client.java and make sure the ip is the same in both of them.

Read full topic

@redneck97 wrote:

It was, Still giving error tho.

item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:

Make sure the server is running before you start the client.

127.0.0.1 is what I have the IP set as.

@deathschaos9 wrote:

The client cannot connect to the defined IP.
